snippet: “New Day,” CNN’s revamped morning show, is trying to set itself apart by offering a less frivolous alternative to “Today” and “Good Morning America.”
abstract: Alessandra Stanley observes that CNN’s revamped morning television show New Day is trying to set itself apart by offering a less frivolous alternative to similar morning news programs like Today and Good Morning America.
lead_paragraph: “New Day,” CNN’s revamped morning show, is trying to set itself apart by offering a less frivolous alternative to “Today” and “Good Morning America.”

headline.seo: ‘New Day,’ a Revamped Morning Show, Makes Its Debut
headline.main: Bright-Eyed and Bushy-Tailed, With a Serious Streak, on CNN
headline.print_headline: Bright-Eyed and Bushy-Tailed, With a Serious Streak, on CNN
